ygData.subject: Re: Who on here is shaman?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a 31 Iksar Shammy (Reptilious) and a 29 Wizzard (Wizzkid). They both have fine attributes. I like the shammy because he can now heal for 300 per shot
ygData.messageBody:
I have a 31 Iksar Shammy (Reptilious) and a 29
Wizzard (Wizzkid). They both have fine attributes. I like
the shammy because he can now heal for 300 per shot
and can have SOW whenever he wants. On the other
hand, I like the Wizzard for his pure offensive power
and his ability to gate to a lot of zones. He is a
deffinate plus in any group. However, if you decide to make
a wizzy be aware that you will probably have to
solo for most of your low levels. Good luck my friend
in whatever you
decide.<br><br>Reptilious/Wizzkid<br>Xegony Server
